step2.title: 2. Create

worksheetPreview.title: 30 Times table chart
worksheetPreview.body: The 30 times table is important for students to understand. Like the 10 times table and 20 times table, every product in the 30 x table ends with a 0 in the ones digit. Understanding the 30x table is important for higher level math, geometry, and chemistry problems. It lays the foundation for learning higher multiplication techniques, crucial in algebraic problem-solving. Students fluent in the 30 times table often exhibit higher confidence in their mathematical capabilities. An interesting fact: 30 has a divisional property, evenly dividing into 60, 90, and 120, making it a common factor in time and angle calculations. See the thirty times table below.

explainerCards.title: Making teaching simple
explainerCards.body: AstroSafe makes the job of organising and creating lessons quick and simple. So teachers can spend more time teaching and less time preping.

cards.title: Teachers
cards.text: For teachers looking for a quick and easy way to prepare curriculum aligned lessons, AstroSafe makes creating a worksheet as simple as clicking a button.

cards.title: Tutors
cards.text: Tutors can easily curate worksheets to appropriate level for each of their students. Personalised worksheet creation has never been simpler and quicker.

cards.title: Parents
cards.text: AstroSafe makes it simple to support your child at home by allowing parents to make classroom-grade worksheets at a click of a button.
